PUBLIC_RECIPES.recipeDesc: Make pizza night super duper out of this world with homemade pizza. This recipe is supreme with vegetables and two types of meat. Yum!
PUBLIC_RECIPES.ingred4: 1 cup cooked and crumbled Italian sausage
PUBLIC_RECIPES.instr1: 1. Preheat the oven to 475°. Spray pizza pan with nonstick cooking or line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
PUBLIC_RECIPES.instr2: 2. Flatten dough into a thin round and place on the pizza pan.
PUBLIC_RECIPES.instr3: 3. Spread pizza sauce over the dough.
PUBLIC_RECIPES.instr4: 4. Layer the toppings over the dough in the order listed .
PUBLIC_RECIPES.instr5: 5. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes or until the crust is crisp and the cheese melted and lightly browned.
